Text: Will you follow the series and upload the new issues ? (the 13th one is out i think)
Issue #13 came out about 2 weeks ago, but apparently has not been scanned yet. As soon as it is, it will be uploaded by someone for sure. :)
I've never scanned a comic before, but when I'm at the shop today I'll see if they have issue 13.  I'll give it a try.
